changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, la.id, l.name AS location, a.name AS attribute, la.key AS key, la.text_value, la.integer_value, r.name AS updated_by, la.version FROM location_attribute la JOIN location l ON la.location = l.id JOIN attribute a ON la.attribute = a.id JOIN agency r ON la.updated_by = r.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON la.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
